scripts.warmup: yarn workspace depseek build:js && yarn workspace esbuild-plugin-entry-chunks build:js && yarn workspace lcov-utils build:js
scripts.build:all: yarn warmup && yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude . run build
scripts.depup: yarn workspace upkeeper build:js && upkeeper --config='{"keepers": ["npm"], "diff": "sed", "combine": true, "post": "yarn"}'
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude packages/infra --exclude . run test:eslint
